subject: Re: Fading Question
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Well, trouble is I'm too public, they guys call me their Princess 
and I use that as a site name. When I talk the the walls, they pop 
back!

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Marlboro63@... wrote:
>
> Hi frank,
>  
> Why should you be any different than the rest of us?  We just try 
not  to 
> answer the voices in public or people will really think we're 
nuts.  But  talking 
> to the walls when we are home alone is completely acceptable...:)
>  
> Jeff
